channel.title: Run
channel.description: when i double click run in my client it brings up a ton of messages which i don't understand, i'm guessing this is the main reason it's not loading. here's the code of the run.bat, any help obviously helps... and don't be hating saying shit like "if you read it you will know what's wrong", i'm really not as good of a coder as that. Here's the run.bat: [code] @echo off Title test START java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause [/code] thanks in advance

item.title: Run
item.dc:creator: @NieX NieX
item.description:
@NieX wrote:

yea im fairly inexperienced, that i can admit. i will post a picture of the batch error, hopefully you will be able to explain what i can do to overcome this ANNOYING error

8xlifp.jpg800×195

Read full topic

item.title: Run
item.dc:creator: @Tozeo Tozeo
item.description:
@Tozeo wrote:

You’re obviously new to coding, and such.
We need the errors from the batch file when you run it.

Read full topic

item.title: Run
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Good sir, your batch script will not help us with anything if there’s a problem with your client. It would be more helpful if you posted the error. Try a different client to determine if the problem is client or server sided.

Read full topic

item.title: Run

item.description:

when i double click run in my client it brings up a ton of messages which i don’t understand, i’m guessing this is the main reason it’s not loading. here’s the code of the run.bat, any help obviously helps… and don’t be hating saying shit like “if you read it you will know what’s wrong”, i’m really not as good of a coder as that. thanks in advance
